p: The script collects several key pieces of information per URL:

li.p: URL Status Codes: Both the Requests and Selenium responses are logged, with the healthier (successful) response prioritized.
Error Information: Any issues encountered (e.g., timeout, connection error, inability to reach complete page load) are serialized into JSON and stored.
Unit Identification: Each URL is linked to a specific unit so that aggregate reporting per unit is easily generated.
Timestamps: Verification times are recorded to check data freshness and to allow rechecking only when necessary.

p: These data points are stored in the SQLite database and exported to CSV for manual review and for feeding into visualization scripts.
